questions.symmetric: Is the symptom symmetric (affects both sides of the body, eg. right and left hand)?
questions.severity: Did the symptom's severity change over time? Have there been periods of deterioration and improvement (variable) or is it persistent/progressive over time?
questions.onset: When did the symptoms first occur?
questions.worsen: For how long have the symptomes been getting worse?
questions.family: Did other family members have the same symptome?
